parameters.functionScript:
let Id = String(Inputs.Id).padStart(3, '0');
Outputs.Sample = Id

parameters.code:
Script.Signals.SetAppState = function () {
    const ha = Script.Inputs['input_ha']
    localStorage.setItem('ha', ha)
    const location = Script.Inputs['input_location']
    localStorage.setItem('location', location)
    const inspe_type = Script.Inputs['input_type']
    localStorage.setItem('inspe_type', inspe_type)
    Noodl.Variables.ha = ha
    Noodl.Variables.location = location
    Noodl.Variables.inspe_type = inspe_type
}

parameters.functionScript:
if(!Inputs.Triggered)return
location.reload();
